analysis.description:
SGTCoinCrowdsale.token (/unique_contracts/0x4456bb7364a4d8a339367298050692a48fde9f21.sol) shadows:

Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_contracts/0x4456bb7364a4d8a339367298050692a48fde9f21.sol#476-480) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x4456bb7364a4d8a339367298050692a48fde9f21.sol#480)

SGTCoinCrowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_contracts/0x4456bb7364a4d8a339367298050692a48fde9f21.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
